casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Oakland McCULLOCH. No. 24P16-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Jan. 21, 2016. Bruce T. Cunningham, Jr., Southern Pines, for McCulloch, Oakland. Ryan Christopher Zellar, for State of North Carolina. Kathleen N. Bolton, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. William R. West, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 21st of January 2016 by State of N.C. for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 21st of January 2016."
